title: Los Santos Drug Wars
headline: Los Santos Drug Wars
subtitle: Play The Last Dose
content:
Once you've completed The First Dose, visit Dax to continue your Los Santos Drug Wars experience with The Last Dose. These five new missions lead you and the troupe down an action-packed rabbit-hole brimming with familiar faces, hired guns, sabotage, kidnapping, and more.

Completing these missions will grant you access to a free Ocelot Virtue and unlock its Trade Price.
